channel.title: Scripting help please
channel.description:
theres some things i would like to get working on this Matrix base i have been working on. i would like to implement the fairy ring. and some dungeons, Getting the Xteas isnt a problem. i just need to know how to script the Ladders. etc.
i am also working on some skills. to fix. but as i cant find any help as to where the issue lies that makes it not work. the two skills im trying to get working are,
Thieving Farming.
any help would be appreciated. im all for helping the community. so if anyone needs help add me on skype
Michaelaarronstrickland and i will help if i can

item.title: Scripting help please
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

as much as i’d love to help you but saddly i cant because i dont know how , and sorry to say but people here wouldn’t be able to help you with that too
